issues.description: MainForm.Docking.cs does NOT use DockingHostFactory - creates panels directly
issues.fix: Consider migrating to DockingHostFactory.CreateDockingHost for consistency and testability

issues.description: SuspendLayout/ResumeLayout imbalance: 1 suspends, 0 resumes - controls won't render
issues.fix: Ensure every SuspendLayout() has matching ResumeLayout(true)

issues.description: Controls added but PerformLayout() never called - layout may not refresh
issues.fix: Call PerformLayout() after adding all controls to force layout refresh

issues.description: NewDockStateEndLoad event not handled - layout may not apply correctly
issues.fix: Subscribe to dockingManager.NewDockStateEndLoad to ensure layout is applied
